Background: Detective Deity: Pharasma

Familiar: May have a familiar

Witch Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 12 from any)
Cauldron: Knows the formulas for 11 common oils or potions and can use Craft to create 2 oils or potions during daily prep
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make an Impression on one
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Familiar's Language: Can speak with animals in the same family as familiar
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and may inflict fascinated and off-guard
Schooled In Secrets: Can use Occultism to Gather Information about secret societies and to Impersonate a member
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead; may target hidden allies with a DC 5 flat check
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master rank provide additional information
Witch's Broom: Can give a broom or similar object a 20' fly Speed for 1 day, or give an existing flying broomstick +10' Speed, during daily prep
Combat
Hit Points: 208 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (5 max); expert) Class DC: Witch: 36 (intelligence; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: None Weapons: Crossbow (+27 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Heavy Crossbow (+27 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Spiked Gauntlet (+26 1d4+4 P; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Defensive Robes: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Rapier as one category simpler
Bounce Back: (F) Wounded condition does not increase when losing the dying condition once per day
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Murksight: Suffers no ranged attack or Perception penalties from non-magical precipitation, and requires no flat check to attack a target concealed by it
Patron's Claim: Familiar can spend 2 actions for a R30' attack that inflicts 10d10 HP spirit and drained 2 (save basic Fortitude also negates drained; critical failure inflicts drained 4) and restores 1 Focus Point to self once per hr
Patron's Presence: Familiar can use 2 actions to create a 15' emanation that inflicts stupefied 2 on foes (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 3) while sustained for up to 1 min once per hr
Spirit Familiar: Familiar can use two actions to leave its body, fly 20' to a foe, inflict 18d6 HP spirit (save basic Will), fly 30' to an ally, and restore HP equal to half the damage dealt once per 10 min
Stitched Familiar: Familiar can use two actions for a R30' attack that inflicts 18d6 HP slashing and immobilized for 1 rd (save basic Reflex also negates immobilized) once per 10 min
Sympathetic Strike: (1) Subsequent hit with a Witch's Armament weapon inflicts -1 saves vs. self hexes for 1 rd, or -2 on a critical hit
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, and +4 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Witch's Armaments (Eldritch Nails): Nails inflict 1d6 HP slashing
Witch's Armaments (Iron Teeth): Teeth inflict 1d8 HP piercing
Witch's Armaments (Living Hair): Hair inflicts 1d4 bludgeoning
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +29 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Will Of The Pupil: Save Master (Will)
Will Of The Pupil: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 5; A10: 2; A1: 4; A2: 4; A3: 4; A4: 4; A5: 4; A6: 4; A7: 4; A8: 4; A9: 4; D0: 5; D10: 2; D1: 4; D2: 4; D3: 4; D4: 4; D5: 4; D6: 4; D7: 4; D8: 4; D9: 4; O0: 5; O10: 2; O1: 4; O2: 4; O3: 4; O4: 4; O5: 4; O6: 4; O7: 4; O8: 4; O9: 4; P0: 5; P10: 2; P1: 4; P2: 4; P3: 4; P4: 4; P5: 4; P6: 4; P7: 4; P8: 4; P9: 4 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Arcane: +26 (intelligence; trained); Divine: +26 (intelligence; trained); Occult: +26 (intelligence; trained); Primal: +26 (intelligence; trained) Spell DC: Arcane: 36 (intelligence; trained); Divine: 36 (intelligence; trained); Occult: 36 (intelligence; trained); Primal: 36 (intelligence; trained)

Magic Notes:
Faith's Flamekeeper: Knows the Stoke The Heart divine cantrip
Faith's Flamekeeper: Spell Trained (Divine)
Hex Spells: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Patron's Gift: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Patron's Truth: +1 10th rank spell slot
Silence In Snow: Knows the Clinging Ice primal cantrip
Silence In Snow: Spell Trained (Primal)
Spinner Of Threads: Knows the Nudge Fate occult cantrip
Spinner Of Threads: Spell Trained (Occult)
Starless Shadow: Knows the Shroud Of Night occult cantrip
Starless Shadow: Spell Trained (Occult)
The Inscribed One: Knows the Discern Secrets arcane spell
The Inscribed One: Spell Trained (Arcane)
The Resentment: Knows the Evil Eye occult cantrip
The Resentment: Spell Trained (Occult)
Wilding Steward: Knows the Wilding Word primal cantrip
Wilding Steward: Spell Trained (Primal)
Witch's Communion: Has increased Witch's Charge effects
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Adaptive Adept: Knows a cantrip or rank 1 spell from a second tradition
Basic Lesson (Dreams): Knows the Veil Of Dreams hex, and familiar knows the Sleep spell
Basic Lesson (Elements): Knows the Elemental Betrayal hex, and familiar knows the choice of the Breath Fire, Gust Of Wind, Hydraulic Push, or Pummeling Rubble spells
Basic Lesson (Life): Knows the Life Boost hex, and familiar knows the Spirit Link spell
Basic Lesson (Protection): Knows the Blood Ward hex, and familiar knows the Mystic Armor spell
Basic Lesson (Vengeance): Knows the Needle Of Vengeance hex, and familiar knows the Phantom Pain spell
Cackle: Knows the Cackle hex
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Conceal Spell: (1) Casts a subsequent spell without an incantation or obvious manifestations
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to attempt to counteract a spell with the same spell
Coven Spell: (1) Gives the triggering ally spell a damage bonus equal to its rank or a spellshape effect
Effortless Concentration: (F) Extends the duration of 1 spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Divine; Primal; Occult; Arcane)
Greater Lesson (Mischief): Knows the Deceiver's Cloak hex, and familiar knows the Mad Monkeys spell
Greater Lesson (Shadow): Knows the Malicious Shadow hex, and familiar knows the Chilling Darkness spell
Greater Lesson (Snow): Knows the Personal Blizzard hex, and familiar knows the Wall Of Wind spell
Hex Focus: Refocus restores all focus points
Hex Master: Can cast multiple hexes per turn, and Cackle Sustains all active hexes
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Divine; Primal; Occult; Arcane)
Major Lesson (Death): Knows the Curse Of Death hex, and familiar knows the Raise Dead spell
Major Lesson (Renewal): Knows the Restorative Moment hex, and familiar knows the Field Of Life spell
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Divine; Primal; Occult; Arcane)
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Rites Of Convocation: Can use a 10-min process to replace a prepared spell with a summoning spell
Rites Of Transfiguration: Can use a 10-min process to replace a prepared spell of at least 6th rank with Cursed Metamorphosis
Siphon Power: (F) Can cast a spell from familiar once per day
Split Hex: (1) Subsequent targeted hex, cast at 2 ranks lower, affects a second target
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Witch Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine; primal; occult; arcane tradition
Witch's Bottle: Can spend 10 min and 1 Focus Point to create a potion that inflicts a hex on the imbiber
Witch's Charge: Knows the direction, distance, and state of 2 willing targets designated during daily prep, and can cast R30' touch spells on that target
Witch's Hut: 1-day ritual creates an animated Huge or smaller dwelling with 39 AC, +28 Perception, 60' Speed 150 HP, and Hardness 10 that can guard, hide, teleport, lock, and move
